attributes.action: Stop Post office closing one card account (POCA2)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Post Ofiice to close one card account thus dictating how many elderly and disabled manage their money.Either they allow others to control their money use cash machines in local shops for which they pay £1.50 a transaction thus cutting their money even more .
By using the one card acoounts in the post office it enables us to pay bills and manage our money on a weekly basis,take it away and surprise surprise the post offices left become unprofitable and so they can be closed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
